title: Enhancing Clinical Competencies: Challenge-Based Learning (CBL) Workshops for Global Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Global Issues and Expert-Level Domain Knowledge (Medical/Legal/Technical)
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Using the CBL (Case-Based Learning) framework, learners analyze global societal issues (e.g., climate change, health disparities) and propose actionable solutions.
Utilizing online collaboration tools, learners effectively communicate with multidisciplinary/multicultural team members to complete project deliverables.
Learners document competencies acquired during global issue-solving processes in reflective journals and develop action plans for future practical application.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
